results.title: Metformin and retinal diseases in preclinical and clinical studies: Insights and review of literature.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and @DISEASE_Retinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D012164 @@@retinal diseases@@@ in preclinical and clinical studies: Insights and review of literature.

results.title: Protective effect of metformin against retinal vein occlusions in diabetes mellitus - A nationwide population-based study
results.text_hl: Previous studies have found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can reduce cardiovascular risk, but its association with @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Vein_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012170 @@@retinal vein occlusion@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Vein_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012170 @@@RVO@@@) is unknown.
